plotlyApplied module¶

Helper functions for using plotly to create html based plots of distribution function as either volume-based isosurfaces (plotVol) or as an animated step-through of z-axis, showing each x-y plane as an image (plotSlices)

plotlyApplied.plotSlices(data)¶
data: np.array(n,n,n)

3D grid. Can be unequally spaced.

plotlyApplied.plotVol(data, drange)¶
data: np.array(n,n,n)

3D grid. Can be unequally spaced.

drange: np.array(d)

axis coordinates. Can be unequally spaced.
